title: Help with the 10 year gift plz
body:
I got the anniversary icon, but I didn't get the mystery gift, even though I already own riot Kayle. Can you please fix that Riot?
 P.S. Can you make a special border for the people who already owned riot Kayle before the 10 year anniversary  to show that we are like " special snowflakes"? Thanks for Everything that you have done by the way Riot!

replies.body: same thing here, i guess i have to wait until something happens

Gifts are rolling out individually and there are a lot of accounts to send them out to.  You may not receive everything all at once, and updates on this will be posted on our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions.
